Package com.andrea.bookyourresort

Interface Villa

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcretePiscinaDecorator, ConcreteVilla, PiscinaDecorator
    public interface Villa
    Villa interface is a component interface used for defining the methods that will be implemented.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> villaActivity
      Declared the ArrayList variable villaActivity that contains all the possible villas activities.

      This method add the customer.
      void sendMessage()
      This method sends email to all followers of the villa type.

      • villaActivity

        static final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> villaActivity

      • addCustomer

        void addCustomer​(java.lang.String userEmail,
                 java.lang.String VillaType)
        This method add the customer.
        Parameters:
        userEmail - string that represents the customer's email
        VillaType - string that represents the type of villa chosen by the customer

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage()
        This method sends email to all followers of the villa type.
